item.title: Love, Rosie
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Love, Rosie Take a deep breath and start at the beginning. Tell them how we first met. Hi. Hi. Alex Stewart? Tell them that ever since we shared our dreams… Yeah! Yeah! I had a dream last night. …even Alex’s weirdest ones. You know a rowing boat? That little curvy bit the oar sits in? It’s called a rollock, by the way. A what? Rollock, like “bollock” with an “R.
